Golf Event Sponsored by City Golf Education Club
5  March,  2024
The golf event, sponsored by Education City Gulf Club, was organized over three days to teach golf techniques by six coaches to students from Pearling Season School with their friends from the Qish Center for Persons with Disabilities and the Trust Center for Special Needs.
